availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Wesley Honaker (Bath County, Kentucky, grocery keeper.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, grocery keeper. Bath County, Kentucky, native. Son of Martin Honaker and Nancy Honaker. Married to Margaret Jane Coyle Honaker. Father of John W. Honaker and Lucy L. Honaker. Attended school in in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocery Keeper in Bath County in 1860. Merchant in Bath County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 61A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 7.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 67A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Bath County, KY, October 1863, p. 170.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994028, Bath County Births.
"Charles Wesley Honaker (September 9, 1839-August 2, 1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial 25675791, accessed March 15, 2019, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25675791.
